description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no rooflights and chimney stack removal to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no rooflights and chimney stack removal to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B, C & G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details are agreed and that Planning Condition 24 (BREEAM) Part 1 of permission 22/01273/KPSID is hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Erection of rear dormer roof extension with juliet balcony and installation of 2nos front rooflights in house 13 and 14 South Lane'
